price: Thus they rejected him, so they were seized by the punishment of the cloudy day; it was the punishment of a horrible day.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٍ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhahum ʿadhābu yawmi al-ẓulati innahu kāna ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
